teacher_info.intro: My name is Anna, I'm a Russian language teacher and a YouTube blogger from Saint-Petersburg.
teacher_info.introduction:
Hello and welcome to my profile! My name is Anna, I'm a Russian language teacher and a YouTube blogger from Saint-Petersburg. 
I teach Russian for foreigners at the university; I also have my YouTube channel for learners of the Russian language, called Russian from Russia, and huge amount of materials for learning Russian on my website, including videos, texts and interactive exercises. 
I'm also a certified TRKI testor.
 I started offering lessons on iTalki a few months ago, and it was only informal tutoring. But later I've understood that some people prefer structured lessons. That's why today you can choose from two types of my guided lessons: structured professional lessons and informal tutoring. 
When I say "structured", I mean that I've designed programs for elementary, intermediate and advanced learners of Russian, and I'll guide you step by step through the Russian language acquisition. 
Informal tutoring is more like conversational practice, answering your questions, assisting with proofreading and other tasks you need. But whether you choose structured lessons or informal tutoring, you will be talking from our first lesson and we'll talk about what YOU want to talk about. 

During our lessons, you will get:

 - Relevant vocabulary for practical, everyday situations - and some TIPS on how to remember it;
 - LOGICAL explanation of Russian grammar;
- INTERACTIVE PERSONALIZED EXERCISES (for structured lessons);
 - A relevant, clear and ACCURATE FEEDBACK, to really perfect your Russian, to increase your motivation, and to learn the language within the shortest possible period of time.

 I believe that it's absolutely essential to have notes after each language session. We'll use Google docs during our lessons, and you'll have the notes from each class, with some comments. These notes are your study material to revise later. I'll even share with you some tips on how you can easily have audio notes after each class, if you wish.
 Hope to see you soon, Anna
teacher_info.about_me: My name is Anna, I'm a Russian language teacher and a YouTube blogger from Saint-Petersburg.
teacher_info.about_teacher: In the last 15 years, I’ve been teaching Russian both at the university and online, on a daily basis, in groups and one-to-one. In addition, I am a person behind Russian from Russia youtube channel and Russian Verbs from Russia audiopodcast; they are absolutely different from all the other youtube channels and podcasts for learners of Russian (you are welcome to check it by yourself). I also have a lot of material on my website russianfromrussia.com
teacher_info.teaching_style:
What is unique about my lessons?
I'm the only one here who makes interactive exercises for each student after each professional lesson.
Moreover, if you book a package of my professional lessons you will have an individual plan for your lessons before we begin and a detailed plan before each lesson. 
After getting the plan, you can write your suggestions to me, and I'll correct the plan according to your needs. 
I correct homeworks between the lessons, so that we could use our lesson time more productively. 
You can find more information about specific courses in the course descriptions.

pro_course_detail.title: Informal Tutoring
pro_course_detail.description:
It's a guided conversation, with my corrections (if you'd like corrections), explanations and comments. We'll use google docs during our lesson, for you to have lesson notes to revise afterwards.

What's the difference between informal conversation lessons and other types of my lessons?
This lesson doesn't include:
-  homework checked and corrected by me before the next lesson
- a lesson plan sent to you before the lesson

pro_course_detail.title: Russian Step by Step (Absolute Beginners to Elementary), homework with corrections and interactive exercises included
pro_course_detail.description:
This is a course for those who are just starting to learn Russian. We'll cover all the basics and will focus on conversation and improving functional vocabulary for everyday communication.

You will learn to
0. Read easy texts in Russian
1. Get acquainted/ Introduce yourself and other people
2. Start conversation with a person /Ask for a phone number/ Ask for repetition
3. Talk about everyday activities/ Tell time / Talk about your plans for a week
4. Make an appointment / Set a meeting
5. Talk about your family/ fill in registration forms
6. Ask people if they have something
7. Talk about your city/ Ask where to go / Understand signs of a city
8. Buy a ticket for metro / Order in a restaurant
9. Refuse or accept an offer
10. Say where you were yesterday
11. Talk about countries/ Ask a person where he/she is from
12. Talk about the weather / seasons
13. Describe your house
14. Talk about your hobbies
15. Explain what you need to buy/ Talk about food preferences.
16. Talk about recepies/ Invite friends for dinner/ Express admiration or criticism
17. Talk to a doctor/ Talk about your health/ Give recommendations
18. Talk about mood and emotions
19. Talk about people's character
20. Describe appearance/ Buy clothes
21. Talk to a taxi driver
22. Talk about your trip. Describe cities

We'll use Google docs during our lessons, and these notes will be your study material to revise later.

pro_course_detail.title: General Russian Step by Step (Low-Intermediate, Intermediate, Advanced);  homework with corrections and interactive exercises included
pro_course_detail.description:
This course is designed for those who are ready to move beyond a basic-level course. The goal is to improve your understanding and fluency in Russian based around your interests. 
After our initial trial lesson, I will plan lessons designed for you. You will have the plan 1-2 days before our lesson. 
Each lesson includes grammar and conversational parts, and  recommendations about listening.
You'll get your homework (an interactive exercise) after each lesson, as well as your homework assignment for our next language session.

We'll use Google docs during our lessons, and these notes will be your study material to revise later.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian through Storytelling (for low-intermediate, intermediate, upper-intermediate and advanced learners)
pro_course_detail.description:
This is a course for those who don't like routine. 
During our lesson, I'll start telling you an interesting story. When answering my questions, you won't just repeat what I've told you: that's not what is called storytelling. You'll be able to discover the plot by yourself, and you'll be able to learn vocabulary and grammar on the way.
Each lesson includes lesson notes and homework and my correction after the lesson.
For preparing a story for you, I should know a bit about your level of Russian; that's why I'm asking you to write me a message before our class, with some information about you and about your learning journey.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian through Russian Movies
pro_course_detail.description:
NEW! This is my new course for those who like watching movies and who prefer to learn by seeing the language being used in a natural context. 
I will send you the lesson plan (in google docs) 24 h before the lesson, with a short film fragment, the lesson's vocabulary, grammar comments and some questions.
During the lesson, we'll duscuss the fragment, learn how to use new vocabulary and grammar. You'll get the transcript of the movie fragment. You'll also have vocabulary and grammar exercises as your homework (it will be checked and corrected by me within a few days after the lesson).

teacher_info.intro: Hi everyone! I´m Aleksandra, a Russian living in Ecuador. I am fond of my two cats, travelling and learning foreign languages. I speak Russian, English, Spanish, and am currently working on my French. Teaching is also my passion, and I can´t wait to share my language learning tips and tricks with you!

teacher_info.about_teacher: I am also a language student, and I understand how much support means in the learning process. I like to celebrate small achievements with the students and encourage them to incorporate language learning to their everyday life outside of class.
teacher_info.teaching_style: In a foreign language, everything is important: we will work on grammar, vocabulary, reading, writing, listening and speaking from the very beginning. At the same time, I do my best to adapt teaching materials  to the interests of every student. Engaging tasks and topics that are essential for real-life conversations are the key to progressing while keeping the motivation.

course_info.trial_description:
Start your journey into Russian or Spanish! In this lesson we will:
 - Talk about your interests and goals, so I can find the best learning materials for you and organize the course according to your needs.
 - If you are already learning the language, we will do some exercises to find out your level.
 - If you are a beginner, we will see why learning Russian / Spanish is cool and check out some basics (greeting, alphabet, similar words in your language).

pro_course_detail.title: Russian: first steps
pro_course_detail.description:
Are you just starting to learn Russian? You are in the right place! Together we´ll make sure that Russian is not very difficult, master the alphabet quickly and learn a lot of helpful phrases and structures to start speaking Russian right away. 

Speaking and writing correctly is important to impress any Russian! In this course we will pronounce a lot of fun sounds like Ж, Щ, and Ы of course, and progress gradually from grammar, so the noun and adjective cases become a piece of cake for you.

We will use different resources, but some of my favourite textbooks are:
 - Поехали! by Stanislav Chernyshov and Alla Chernyshova
 - Точка РУ by Ekaterina Novačac and Olia Dolmatova
I hope you will like them too!

pro_course_detail.title: Spanish: first steps
pro_course_detail.description: Are you just starting to learn Spanish? I´ve been there too! Together we´ll review some tricky letters and letter combinations that are not what they seem, master some important phrase structures and start right away with the most important conversation topics.

teacher_info.intro:
Hi there!

My name is Almat. Mucho gusto :)

I'm from Kazakhstan, but currently residing in Budapest, Hungary.

I'm so passionate with learning foreign languages and that's why I'm here on Italki - to share my love for languages with people from all over the world and to spread the idea of learning languages to as much people as I can throughout my life.

Up to this moment, I speak eight languages: Kazakh, Russian, English, Spanish, French, Italian, Portuguese and German.

In my free time, I also like doing sports (in particular: ice-skating and street workout) and reading books.

Having said this, I'd be really glad to see you all on my fun lessons.

Ciao, hasta pronto ;)

teacher_info.about_teacher:
At the age of 17, when I was studying in high school, I started teaching English to younger students of my school as they used to have difficulties with their classes.
I believe all of us agree that the main problem is the way the languages are taught at schools or universities - mostly inefficient and boring.
Therefore, from that time, I started improving my rusty English by myself, with the help of different resources that I could possibly find on the Internet and later use the language learning methods that worked for me to teach others English in a casual and fun way.

Por tanto, ya tengo 3 años de experiencia enseñando el inglés a más de 200 personas y el español a más de 50 personas :)
teacher_info.teaching_style:
Basically, I want to devote the major part of my lessons for conversations since I believe this is what most of us lack in.
I'm not denying the importance of some other language skills like listening, reading and writing (which actually are crucial too).
As for me, I'd rather prefer the way: for a student - to have a chance to improve their speaking abilities while having fun; and for teachers and tutors - to maintain an interesting and engaging conversation with a student.
Therefore, I want to give an opportunity for the students to talk as much as they want. Without any hesitations, fears and doubts. And finally to show everyone that it's possible to speak in a foreign language fluently :)

course_info.trial_description:

I'm inviting you to have a trial lesson with me in any of the four languages that I teach here on Italki: English, Spanish, Kazakh or Russian.

I want our trial lesson to be mostly conversation-oriented so that we can get to know each other better, clearly define your language learning goals together and move on accordingly.

Los invito a tomar una clase de prueba conmigo en uno de los cuatro idiomas que enseño aqui en iTalki: ingles, español, kazajo o ruso.

Quiero que nuestra clase de prueba sea orientada basicamente a la conversacion para que se pueda conocerse mejor, definir sus metas linguisticas claramente juntos y seguir adelante respectivamente.


Барлықтарыңызға сәлем, Алмат сіздермен хабарда!

Сіздерді менімен бірге iTalki-да мен үйрететін кез келген төрт тілдің біреуінде сынақ сабағын өткізуге шақырамын: ағылшын тілі, испан тілі, қазақ тілі немесе орыс тілі.

Мен біздің сынақ сабағымыздың көбіне әңгімелесуге бағытты болғанын қалаймын.
Соның негізінде, біз бір-бірімізбен жақсырақ танысып, сіздердің тілдік мақсаттарыңызды бірге нақты айқындап және де әрі қарай тиісінше қозғала аламыз.


Всем здравствуйте, на связи Алмат!

Я вас приглашаю провести вместе со мной пробное занятие на одном из четырёх языков которые я преподаю здесь в iTalki: английский, испанский, казахский или русский.

Я хочу, чтобы наше пробное занятие был в основном ориентирован на разговор так как, на основе этого, мы сможем узнать друг о друге получше, чётко определить ваши языковые цели вместе и двигаться дальше соответственно.

See you soon :)
Hasta pronto :)
Кездескенше :)
До скорой встречи :)

pro_course_detail.title: Spanish for Beginners/Español para principiantes/Бастаушыларға арналған испан тілі сабағы/Испанский для начинающих
pro_course_detail.description:
The main goal of this lesson is to get some basic knowledge in Spanish (such as greetings, self-introduction, basic vocabulary etc.).

During these lessons, we'll be using a book called "Hugo: Spanish in three months" (by Isabel Cisneros) to learn the most fundamental grammar and vocabulary that will allow you to start speaking Spanish from our first lesson.

In addition, I'll be using my own knowledge and methods (based on teaching with using body language, constantly asking questions from a student, giving some real examples and so on) that I've gained teaching Spanish up to this moment to make sure you get familiar with all the possible aspects of this language with my help.

Interested?
Already willing to speak Spanish from the first lesson?

Then I invite you to book a lesson with me here on Italki.

pro_course_detail.title: Kazakh for Beginners/Kazajo para principiantes/Бастаушыларға арналған қазақ тілі сабағы/Казахский для начинающих
pro_course_detail.description:
The main goal of this lesson is to get some basic knowledge in Kazakh (such as greetings, self-introduction, basic vocabulary etc.).

As you know, there are very few resources to learn Kazakh on the Internet. Therefore, during our lessons, we'll be using books that pupils use to learn English based on Kazakh. The trick is that we'll go the other way around - learning Kazakh based on English with the help of those kinds of books to learn the most fundamental grammar and vocabulary that will allow you to start speaking Kazakh from our first lesson.

Likewise, we'll watch some videos and listen to audios in Kazakh together to start improving your basic comprehension of the language from the first lessons.

In addition, I'll be using my own knowledge and methods (based on teaching with using body language, constantly asking questions from a student, giving some real examples and so on) that I've gained teaching Kazakh up to this moment to make sure you get familiar with all the possible aspects of this language with the help of a native speaker.

Interested?

I'm looking forward to seeing you soon!

pro_course_detail.title: Let's read in Kazakh!/Vamos a leer en kazajo!/Қазақ тілінде оқиық!/Давайте читать на казахском!
pro_course_detail.description:
Have you ever wondered how cool it'd look being able to read in Kazakh?

Yes, I know what you're thinking of - different alphabetic system which makes it impossible for you to read anything in Kazakh.

But here come our lessons where we'll be improving our reading skills in Kazakh together.

First of all, not surprising - we'll learn the Kazakh alphabet with all of its 42 letters.
I can guarantee that you'll be able to read everything written in Kazakh after 1-2 lessons.
It's not difficult at all, believe me, you'll get it as well :)

After having mastered the alphabet, comes the most interesting - we'll finally start reading in Kazakh.
As for the beginning, we'll begin with very simple stories written for children so that you can get the most fundamental Kazakh vocabulary from those.
Gradually, we'll be progressing, and as we progress, we'll be reading some more authentic things (news, articles, blogs etc.).
Perhaps up until the novels in Kazakh, who knows?

Are you still interested?

Then get a booking with me here on Italki and let's get started exploring the mysterious world of Kazakh language through reading activities.

Сізді сабақтарымда асыға күтемін, кездескенше!

teacher_info.intro: Меня зовут Елена. Родом из Москвы, живу в небольшом, живописном и уютном подмосковном городе с итальянским названием. Люблю путешествовать и читать. Любимые русские слова: огурец, забияка, (не) волноваться. Любимое место в Москве: Александровский сад. В 2000 г. закончила юридический факультет МГУ им. Ломоносова. Работала юристом в социальной и коммерческих сферах. Училась в Московском Институте Лингвистики, изучала методику преподавания иностранных языков. Отдельно изучала методику преподавания русского языка иностранцам. Преподаю оба языка с 2012 года. Имею несколько международных сертификатов по французскому языку, в том числе подтверждённый уровень С2.

Имею несколько международных сертификатов по французскому языку, в том числе подтверждённый уровень С2.

teacher_info.intro: I am Armine. I live in Armenia. I graduated from the Faculty of Philology of Gavar State University with a Red Diploma․ I am a teacher of Armenian language and literature․ I work offline and via Skype more than 8 years.
teacher_info.short_signature: Certified Armenian teacher with over 12 years of teaching experience
teacher_info.introduction:
Hello, how are you?
If you read this text, then you are interested in Armenian, one of the world's oldest languages. If you also love the Armenian language, let's work together. 
I studied at Gavar State University (Armenia), Faculty of Philology, with specialization in “Philologist, Teacher of Armenian Language and Literature” (http://www.gsu.am/?lang=ru). 
I am a professional Armenian teacher with extensive work experience, but every time I meet a new student, I open the treasure trove that is the Armenian language and once again discover that wonderful world in a new way.
I've taught via Skype since September of 2013. I teach children and adults. I have different courses for tourists and for those who want to be fluent in Armenian to develop their ability to translate, listen, speak or write.
I have my personal program and, I approach each student as an individual because I think everyone in the world is unique.
I am the creator of a popular Facebook group dedicated to the study of the Armenian language, called “Let’s Learn Armenian” (https://www.facebook.com/groups/337437353054892/members/). 
I love learning new languages and, discovering new cultures. Currently, I am learning Chinese, so I know how difficult it is to learn a different and new language, so I, therefore, try to make my lessons flexible, interesting, and useful for everyone.
Let’s learn Armenian together.
teacher_info.about_me: I am Armine. I live in Armenia. I graduated from the Faculty of Philology of Gavar State University with a Red Diploma․ I am a teacher of Armenian language and literature․ I work offline and via Skype more than 8 years.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
I am a professional foreign language teacher of Armenian with extensive work experience. I have been teaching Armenian in the school system for five years, and also offer private lessons, both off and online. I have been teaching through Skype for a number of years.
I am the creator of a popular Facebook group dedicated to the study of the Armenian language, called “Let’s Learn Armenian” (https://www.facebook.com/groups/337437353054892/members/). On this group’s page you can find a great deal of materials and interactive exercises about the Armenian language and culture.
This is my new page on Facebook- https://www.facebook.com/Armenian86/?epa=SEARCH_BOX
teacher_info.teaching_style:
I offer conversational Armenian and Armenian for tourists. I design individual programs of study for each student and give lessons to children, as well.
Based on advanced English tests I created tests for checking your Armenian level-Begginer-0, Elementary-A1, Pre-Intermadiate-l A2, Intermadiate-B1, Upper-Intermadiate-B2, Advanced-C1, Proficient-C2.

Elementary-A1 test is free. You can write me, I'll send you, then we can discuss together your answers.

You can take a lesson (30 minute) and I'll send you just the test for 10$. If you want after your answers I check your knowledge you must take 45 minutes lesson for 20$ (-Begginer-0, Pre-Intermadiate- A2) and 60 minutes lesson for 30$ Upper.

course_info.trial_description:
If you have not yet decided whether you want to start the interesting journey of learning Armenian with me, the trial lesson will help you to be sure of your dilemmas.
Well, let's get started․

pro_course_detail.title: Let's learn Armenian together
pro_course_detail.description:
I offer conversational Armenian, Armenian for tourists, Armenian literature, Armenian for translators. I design individual programs of study for each student and gives lessons to children, as well.
 I have my own writing lessons and my students prefer to use my own lessons, which are more practical.
In this package, each lesson has its own structure, which is typical of the other twenty-five documents. Each lesson consists of four parts. The first part is a short story on a topic. The second part is the dictionary, where you will find words taken out of history and related to history. The third part is a simple but instructive grammar lesson. The fourth part is the exercises that refer to the "history" and grammar in that document.
In addition, I am a writer, translator from English and Russian to Armenian.

pro_course_detail.title: Armenian for kids
pro_course_detail.description:
I love working with both adults and children. The world of children is very colorful, they learn the language through process, movement, games and performances. We learn beautiful poems and songs, talk about Armenia and Armenian culture.
 I use books for Armenian schools, audio and video materials, performances. Children are flexible, I try to use every minute correctly to work with them, so that not only they do not get tired, but also learn new things with pleasure.

pro_course_detail.title: Armenian speaking
pro_course_detail.description:
Dear Armenian learners, If you want to speak Armenian, try to apply the knowledge you have gained, we can talk about interesting and applicable topics. 
You can choose any topic or topics you are interested in and we will talk about that topic or topics. Also I can suggest different topics that are interesting and meaningful.
Let's start, ))

teacher_info.intro:
Stop learning Russian with black-and-white books. Use the most modern ways to start speaking Russian like Interactive Lessons.

Hi, my name is Katya, and I am a professional Russian teacher. I adore the Russian language and want to share my love with other people. To show the beauty of the Russian language to other people, I have created an Instagram page (@rus_library) and YouTube channel dedicated to learning Russian with a lot of great resources.
teacher_info.short_signature: 🧑‍🤝‍🧑 New course: Group Interactive lessons. Have more fun for a lower price!
teacher_info.introduction: My name is Katya, and I am a Russian teacher. I speak 4 languages: Russian, English, German and Spanish, so I know what difficulties can a student face with during learing foreign languages. That is why I can find different approaches to teach a student accroding to his/her goals and abilities. BEFORE THE FIRST LESSON I would like to know some information about your Russian learning experience to prepare a lesson in a proper way. Usually I interview students during the first lesson to get to know each other and to understand for what purpose he/she studies Russian and the level of the language. THE SYSTEM OF LESSONS Russian for beginners Is it your first step in learning Russian? We will start with basic every-day Russian language and very soon you will be able to read Cyrillic and discuss simple topics in Russian. General Russian On the first lesson we will determine your level in Russian language and find a program that suits you. The system of lesson depends completely on you and your goals. We will discuss topics that are interesting for you. Conversational Russian Do you wish to become a fluent Russian speaker? So speaking course is one that you need. In my lessons I use communicative teaching approach that helps students to start speaking language fast and fluent. I will do my best to make lessons interesting and effective for you. Intensive Russian Do you want to learn the basics of the Russian language for you next holiday? I can offer you a short course with every-day Russian language that will completely suit your requests. Business Russian Are you looking for a head start before working in Russia? There is a business course for employees that will help you to communicate with your colleges. If you have any questions or want to know more, feel free to message me! I look forward to meeting you!
teacher_info.about_me:
Stop learning Russian with black-and-white books. Use the most modern ways to start speaking Russian like Interactive Lessons.

Hi, my name is Katya, and I am a professional Russian teacher. I adore the Russian language and want to share my love with other people. To show the beauty of the Russian language to other people, I have created an Instagram page (@rus_library) and YouTube channel dedicated to learning Russian with a lot of great resources.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
To describe myself better as a teacher, I will attach several feedbacks from my students:

- Katya is a very caring, encouraging and positive and is flexible to seeing where I am at and how she can help me improve. she is very organised with teaching materials to help me learn and homework to help cement my learning. i am looking forward to my lesson with her. Thank you Katya!

- Katya is very good at attending to the needs of her learners. Her lesson plans are fun and of very high quality, she can also adapt very quickly to fix problems with my Russian. She really understands language learning very well. I am very impressed after my first 2 lessons!
teacher_info.teaching_style:
What are interactive lessons?
⠀
Interactive lessons are lessons where you will not sit and listen to a monotonous lecture of a teacher, but be an active part of the process that really reminds of a game. You will listen to live audios, watch videos, complete tasks and vocabulary exercises with colourful pictures. This way of lessons will keep you motivated and interested. You will see yourself what path you have covered and how much you still need to go.

exp_info.description: I have taught more than 5000 lessons online. This experience helped me to build my own program from 0 to the level C1 for Russian students and then it was proved by the students' results.
I have created my own online Russian school with self-study courses, Russian Marathons and a lot of useful information about the Russian language

⠀

pro_course_detail.title: Interactive Lessons for any level (A0-C1)
pro_course_detail.description:
Interactive lessons are lessons where you will not sit and listen to a monotonous lecture of a teacher, but be an active part of the process that reminds of a game. You will listen to live audios, watch videos, complete tasks and vocabulary exercises with colourful pictures. This way of lessons will keep you motivated and interested. You will see yourself what path you have covered and how much you still need to go.

An example of the curriculum for the A1 course: 
Alphabet (Grammar: Russian genders).
Unit 1. My family (Grammar: possessive pronouns).
Unit 2. My week (Grammar: Present tense).
Unit 3. Food (Grammar: Accusative case).
Unit 4. My plans (Grammar: Past and Present tense).
Unit 5. My house (Grammar: Locative case).
Revision I
Unit 6. Weather (Grammar: Modal verbs).
Unit 7. Money (Grammar: Genitive case).
Unit 8. Where are you going today? (Grammar: Verbs of motion).
Unit 9. What is your favourite restaurant? (Grammar: Adjectives).
Unit 10. My routine (Grammar: Perfective aspect).
Revision II
Unit 11. Stereotypes (Grammar: Locative case. Pronouns).
Unit 12. Family tree (Grammar: Genitive case. Possession).
Unit 13. Transport in Russia (Grammar: Verbs of motion. Transport).
Unit 14. Going to a shop (Grammar: Genitive case. Numbers).
Unit 15. Who is your favourite musician? (Grammar: Accusative case. Animate).
Revision III
Unit 16. Going to the birthday (Grammar: Dative case).
Unit 17. Going to a theatre (Grammar: Dative case. Pronouns).
Unit 18. How to study a language? (Grammar: Imperative aspect).
Unit 19. My hobbies and work (Grammar: Instrumental case).
Unit 20. Personality (Grammar: Instrumental case. Pronouns).
Revision IV
Final Revision

course_info.trial_description: During the trial lesson I will introduce you to the basics of Polish lauguage and I will tell you about my teaching methods. With more advanced students we will have a short conversation to check your language level and we will select a program that specifically fits your needs.

pro_course_detail.title: Polish language for beginners
pro_course_detail.description: If you are just starting to learn Polish or you only know the basics, is the right course for you. You will start with an introduction to Polish pronunciation and basic phrases. In the following lessons I will teach you the key grammar and vocabulary issues in a practical way. A wide range of vocabulary will make your Polish sound natural from the start. During the course you will start to feel that you can communicate without difficulty in typical, simple situations.

pro_course_detail.title: Intermediate Polish - Living language
pro_course_detail.description: Course will expand your mastery of grammar and vocabulary and prepares you to discuss and write, in Polish, in a variety of styles.

pro_course_detail.title: Informal Tutoring
pro_course_detail.description: Please only choose this option if you are self-studying person and looking for a conversation partner.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian language for beginners
pro_course_detail.description: You will learn to read the Russian alphabet and practice basic conversation and language structures. You will develop basic skills in reading, writing, understanding and speaking Russian.

pro_course_detail.title: Intermediate Russian - Living language
pro_course_detail.description: Lessons for learners who can already speak and understand Russian with a certain confidence. The course will enrich your Russian vocabulary, get used to usual conversational speech, and learn many other interesting things about Russia and Russians.

teacher_info.intro: Hi! My name is Yelnaz and I am a Russian and English teacher. I have been teaching for around 6 years now because I am interested in learning languages myself (I know Russian, Kazakh, English, Chinese, a bit of Spanish and French) and I love helping other people to learn. I find my profession to be very interesting and  enjoy every moment of doing my job. In my free time I enjoy going to the movies, listening to music, socializing with my friends, and reading books. The latter unquestionably aided me in learning new languages.

teacher_info.teaching_style: I have been a teacher of languages for a long period of time and have learnt to understand different people and their learning capabilities. I think it helps me to organize my lessons in a way which is not only interesting for learners but also in accordance with their abilities. Moreover, I have come to realize that many students know how to read but cannot speak and so I facilitate speaking exercises

I can help students with any level of English. Lessons include grammar, improving conversational skills, and any additional wishes of the students.

teacher_info.about_teacher: Корейский язык я изучала с 2014 по 2016 гг в Корее ня языковых курсах в Кимпо колледже. С 2017 по 2020 работала гидом-переводчиком с корейскими туристами в Санкт-Петербурге. У меня большой опыт разговорной практики. Так же я перевожу сериалы и Шоу для фансаб группы Зипперы. Есть различный опыт последовательного перевода на мероприятиях. С марта по октябрь 2021 года я работала последовательным устным переводчикомЯзык начала преподавать в марте 2020 года. Для меня важен не быстрый прогресс, а понимание учеником материала. Можно зазубрить лексику и грамматические конструкции, но не найти им применения в жизни. Поэтому весь новый материал мы обязательно прорабатываем в устной и письменной форме.
teacher_info.teaching_style: Основой занятий являются учебники Сеульского Университета и Корейского Университета Иностранных Языков , но многие материалы я беру из других источников, таких как учебники, телешоу и фильмы. Я учитываю интересы учеников, когда рекомендую им аудиоматериалы. Иногда на уроках мы разбираем песни или диалоги из фильмов. Даю много домашнего задания, в которое входит: письменная часть, устная и аудирование.

course_info.trial_description:
На уроке мы сможем вместе подобрать индивидуальную программу для изучения. 
Я расскажу о своих методах преподавания. 
Проверю уровень владения языком, если ученик уже изучал его ранее. 
Пройдём небольшое количество материала, в зависимости от запросов и уровня знаний ученика.

pro_course_detail.title: Корейский язык для начинающих. (0-3 уровни)
pro_course_detail.description:
Уроки корейского языка для начинающих. 
Мы начнём с изучения Хангыль (корейской письменности). Научимся читать, писать и составлять не сложные предложения. 
Если Вы уже изучали корейский язык, то определим Ваш уровень и подстроим программу под Ваш уровень.

pro_course_detail.title: Speaking practice of Russian language with native speaker. 순수한 러시아 사람과 러시아어 말하기 연습.
pro_course_detail.description:
Before the lesson start you can choose any topic you want to talk about. I will prepare some useful words and expressions for this topic. 
If you want casual conversation or talk about art, history and culture, welcome to my lesson. 
수업 시작하기 전에 저에게 원하는 화제를 미리 알려 주셔도 좋습니다. 제가 그 화제에 자주 쓰는 단어와 표현을 준비해서 재미이는 말하기 수업을 해 드리겠습니다. 
일상 대화나 예술, 역사, 문화를 궁금하시는 분들을 환영합니다.

teacher_info.intro:
Good day, ladies and gentlemen. My name is Yulia, I am a native Russian speaker from Kiev, Ukraine. 
Gaining fluency in the English language resides among the most valued and rewarding experiences I of my life. It has been a considerable journey, in which I had the opportunity to work out a deeper understanding of both my mother and step-mother tongues.

Both Russian and English are incredibly widely spoken: over 153.6 million people around the world speak Russian, and nearly 1.35 billion are able to freely communicate in English. My goal as a language tutor is to help those people have better connection with each other.
teacher_info.about_me:
Good day, ladies and gentlemen. My name is Yulia, I am a native Russian speaker from Kiev, Ukraine. 
Gaining fluency in the English language resides among the most valued and rewarding experiences I of my life. It has been a considerable journey, in which I had the opportunity to work out a deeper understanding of both my mother and step-mother tongues.

Both Russian and English are incredibly widely spoken: over 153.6 million people around the world speak Russian, and nearly 1.35 billion are able to freely communicate in English. My goal as a language tutor is to help those people have better connection with each other.
teacher_info.about_teacher: I am a native Russian speaker who learned Ukrainian as my second language in middle school and English as the third soon after. In those experiences I have found that genuine interest is always the key to successful learning, and my teaching strategy revolves around keeping yours peaked by helping you develop an understanding of the new language, rather than cramming your way into it.
teacher_info.teaching_style: The best way to learn a language is by inserting it into your regular routine, which is what I will help you do, casually, naturally, much like a child learns to put the world around them into words, which we all know is effective, as all of us have the experience of successfully learning our first language.

course_info.trial_description:
Meet your potential teacher :)

I am looking forward to getting to know you, your aspirations, inspirations, and expectations.

Hereby I shall leave you to it before I'm out of words that end with 'ations'.

pro_course_detail.title: English Conversation & Storytelling/Английская Разговорная Практика и Повествование
pro_course_detail.description:
Conversational lessons are aimed to help you practice your articulation and ability to form sentences on the spot through an act of live communication. I am equipped with a wide verity of topics to discuss to suit all levels and interests.

Storytelling is an incredibly helpful lingual practice for those who already hold some command of the English language and are working on fluency. In those lessons we will be creating fun little stories, building a skill that is substantial in real life communication.

Уроки разговорной речи направлены на то, чтобы помочь вам в практике артикуляции и умении составлять предложения на месте посредством живого общения. В моем арсенале имеется множество тем для обсуждения, подходящих для всех уровней и интересов.

Повествование - это невероятно полезная языковая практика для тех, кто уже немного владеет английским языком и работает над его беглостью (флюенцией) . На этих уроках мы будем создавать небольшие забавные рассказы, развивая навыки, необходимые для общения в реальной жизни.

pro_course_detail.title: General English/Общий Английский
pro_course_detail.description:
The general lessons are aimed at helping you expend your knowledge by providing you with new materials, techniques, and information. I encourage you to take general lessons in combination with the ones that let you apply your skills in realistic situations, mush like Conversation or Storytelling lessons.

Общие уроки направлены на то, чтобы помочь вам расширить свои знания, предоставляя вам новые материалы, методики и информацию. Я рекомендую вам брать общие уроки в сочетании с теми, которые позволяют вам применять свои навыки в реалистичных ситуациях, таких как Разговорные и Повествовательные уроки.

pro_course_detail.title: English Pronunciation/Английское Произношение
pro_course_detail.description:
Generally, it is not expected of someone who learned a language later in life to not have a foreign accent. However, the closer we get to sounding like a native speaker, the more confidant we feel about our lingual skills, while some of you may feel a bit self-conscious about some of the sounds that just won’t come out right. The pronunciation lessons are aimed at polishing your accent. 

Personally, I chose to stick with neutral American accent, but I would be happy to help you with the so called "Proper English" should that be your choice.

Обычно от человека, выучившего язык в более позднем возрасте, не ожидается, безупречного акцента, однако ничто не придает уверенности в своих лингвистических навыках, как возможность звучать как прирожденный носитель языка, в то время как некоторые из вас могут чувствовать некое стеснение из-за некоторых звуков, которые все никак не звучат естественно. Уроки произношения направлены на то, чтобы отточить ваш акцент.

Лично я предпочитаю придерживаться нейтрального американского акцента, но я так же буду рада помочь вам и с так называемым "Королевским Английским" по вашему выбору.

teacher_info.about_teacher:
Я уверена, что живое общение намного эффективнее помогает освоить иностранный язык, чем обучение по различным материалам, Поэтому я стараюсь создать дружелюбную, комфортную и приятную атмосферу на уроке.  

I focus on creating comfortable, friendly and enjoyable atmosphere during the lesson. I am very supportive and encouraging and do everything to help you relax and have fun while practicing!
teacher_info.teaching_style:
На уроках мы будем много говорить и обсуждать интересующие вас темы, а также поработаем над произношением и расширением словарного запаса. В процессе разговора я помогу вам заметить и исправить ошибки, при необходимости объясню правила и отвечу на возникающие вопросы. 

Если вас интересует время, которое недоступно в расписании, можете написать мне сообщение.

The lessons are conversation-based and can be adapted to your needs and goals. I'll be happy to discuss anything you're interested in. I can also correct your mistakes, explain the rules and grammar points and help you boost your vocabulary.

If you don't see the available time slot that works for you, you can write me a message.

pro_course_detail.description: In these lessons, we will work with a textbook and other materials and focus on grammar rules as well as reading and pronunciation. I will send you some homework when requested.

teacher_info.intro:
Hi everyone!  My name’s Ekaterina and I’m a qualified teacher from St. Petersburg, Russia. I have MA Degree in Education and more than 8 years of teaching experience. I enjoy travelling, reading, communicating with people and just living my life. See you soon!

teacher_info.short_signature: Certified English and Russian as a foreign language teacher with more than 10 years of experience
teacher_info.introduction:
Hi everyone!  My name’s Ekaterina and I’m a qualified teacher from St. Petersburg, Russia. I have MA Degree in Education and more than 5 years of teaching experience. I’ve been teaching online students from all over the world since 2015 and I’m a language learner myself, so I know the problems students can struggle with during their way of acquiring a new language. 
I am also an examiner. I work for universities to test foreign students who want to get their language certificates in Russian and English. I have also passed CAE and completed an examiner training module from Pearson. 
I enjoy teaching and build my lessons in a fun and natural way. I believe that any language you learn is firstly needed for communication therefore all the lessons are tailor-made. At the beginning levels it’s essential to build the right base. For this purpose grammar comes to the learning process. 
During the lesson we’ll work on your pronunciation, vocabulary and grammar. We'll also watch videos, read articles and practice the real spoken language. I also have a set of ppx presentations, designed myself to make you speak as much as possible. 
I look forward to teaching you. If you have any questions, do not hesitate to contact me. 
See you soon! 

*Please try to notify me at least 24 hours in advance if you need to cancel, otherwise the cancellation will be payed. I wait for you only 15 min. from the beginning of the lesson.

Мы будем также смотреть видео, читать современные статьи и практиковать русский разговорный язык. До скорой встречи!

Я учу студентов со всего мира говорить по-русски и по-английски, и я знаю, с какими проблемами сталкиваются ученики во время обучения. На уроках мы будем заниматься тем, что вам необходимо, для достижения именно ваших целей, начиная c лексики и грамматики и заканчивая разговорным языком. До встречи!
teacher_info.about_teacher:
I have MA Degree in Education and more than 8 years of teaching experience. I’ve been teaching online students from all over the world since 2015 and I’m a language learner myself, so I know the problems students can struggle with during their way of acquiring a new language. 
I am also an examiner. I work for universities to test foreign students who want to get their language certificates in Russian and English. I have also passed CAE and completed an examiner training module from Pearson.

Внимание! Если вы опаздываете без предупреждения, я жду вас на уроке 15 минут, после этого урок считается завершенным и оплаченным.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
I enjoy teaching and build my lessons in a fun and natural way. I believe that any language you learn is firstly needed for communication so all the lessons are tailor-made.
I know how difficult it is to learn without a structure. For your convenience I always offer structured lessons when you understand where from we start and what our strategy is to acheve your goals.
At the beginning levels it’s essential to build the right base. For this purpose grammar comes to the learning process. 
During the lesson we’ll work on your pronunciation, vocabulary and grammar. We'll watch videos, read articles and practice the real spoken language. My desire is to make you speak as much as possible.
teacher_info.cancel_policy: *Please try to notify me at least 24 hours in advance if you need to cancel, otherwise the cancellation will be payed. I wait for you only 15 min. from the beginning of the lesson.

teacher_info.intro: I'm a native Russian speaker and a professional English teacher. I've been teaching English for over 10 years and I have 5-year experience of teaching Russian, too. I've graduated from Lomonosov Moscow State University and have a PhD in Linguistics.
teacher_info.introduction: I've been teaching English for over 10 years to students of all ages and abilities. I've graduated from MSU with distinction and have a PhD, so I'm qualified in teaching English. I also know French and Norwegian well enough to explain something to you in one of these languages if it happens to be your native language. I'm qualified in teaching Norwegian and I have a Master 1 diploma in French literature. As for English, I can teach you British pronunciation (RP), conversational English, business English, general English or English grammar as well as help you preparing for your test. We could discuss a variety of subjects, such as culture, travelling, relations, job, health, food - whatever you like. I must admit though that I'm not much into politics. I can also help you to learn Russian, including Russian pronunciation, grammar and conversation skills.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversational Russian
pro_course_detail.description:
Whether you are a beginner or an advanced learner of Russian, I can help you to improve your speaking skills and to learn some useful words and expressions. We could discuss a variety of topics, from family to art. Just tell me about your goals and interests.

I can also teach you:
- appropriate phrases to be used in different social situations  
- Russian pronunciation and intonation
- some conversational and slang words
- some grammar so that you don't make mistakes when speaking

If there is anything specific I can help you with, just let me know.

pro_course_detail.title: General Russian
pro_course_detail.description: Professional lessons of Russian. I use a teaching method that will let you speak Russian without mistakes very soon. Unlike what most Russian student's books suggest, we will not focus on conversational topics like family, food and so on. Instead, we will concentrate on learning lexical-grammatical structures used in everyday speech and on conversational practice. This will let you express your thoughts in Russian, whatever topic you choose.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversational English
pro_course_detail.description:
This is a course for students of all levels, from beginner to advanced. I'll be happy to help you improve your speaking skills and expand your vocabulary. We can discuss a variety of topics, whatever you are interested in.

I'll also try to help you avoid grammar mistakes when speaking and correct your pronunciation, if needed. I can teach you the standard British pronunciation (RP).

If there is anything specific I can help you with, just let me know.

pro_course_detail.title: British Accent - RP
pro_course_detail.description: If you have a standard English accent, you're likely to produce a favourable impression on whoever you're speaking with. In this course I will teach you how to pronounce English sounds and how to use intonation properly. You will sound like a real Brit of high social class!

-На русском языке для начинающих будет много практики и знание необходимого словарного запаса и базовых грамматических правил для правильного построения предложение
-На разговорной практике мы ведем непринужденный диалог , либо обсуждаем определенную тему. Я помогаю ученику подобрать подходящие слова и правильно посторить предложение.

pro_course_detail.title: Pronunciation | Произношение
pro_course_detail.description:
Если ты хочешь улучшить свое произношение и говорить по-русски без акцента , то эти занятия определенно для тебя! На занятиях по произношению мы будем читать вслух тексты , повторять русские скороговорки и пытаться выговаривать труднопроизносимые слова!
Буду рад тебя видеть:)

If you want to improve your pronunciation and speak Russian without an accent, then these classes are definitely for you! In pronunciation classes, we will read texts aloud, repeat Russian tongue twisters and try to pronounce hard-to-pronounce words!
I will be glad to see you :)

teacher_info.about_teacher: Teaching and learning are my biggest passions. I`ve been giving lessons for more than 10 years (language schools and centres, private lessons, offline and online, in groups and 1 to 1, kids, teenages and adults). Every person needs a special approach, that`s why I always prepare for each of my lessons.  My students work and study in different cities around the world and I`m really happy to eyewitness their success in language learning!   #competent, #supportive
teacher_info.teaching_style:
When you learn, you become a better version of yourself.  
In my work I stick to the following guidelines:
1) communication===we use the language we study from the first minutes,
2) accuracy & improvement=== we work on grammar, pronunciation and vocabulary. 
3) culture ===we learn about culture from videos, texts, songs and discuss cultural differences,
4) cooperation===we work together in the same direction. 
Good luck with learning and looking forward to meeting you!
